title: I've lost access to my phone and can't log in
content:
If you’ve lost access to your phone and have two-step verification enabled, please use one of your backup codes to regain access to your account and update your two-step verification settings. These codes were generated when you set up two-step verification.
If you don’t have access to any of your backup codes, please follow these steps to contact support:
Enter your username and password as usual.
On the two-step verification screen, click
Try Another Way
.
Click
Contact Support
.
Please enter an optional brief description and click
Submit
. Our Support team will get back to you within a few business days.
